text: That there is no "blessed" IDE in Julia. Too many tools RStudio produces require the RStudio GUI when they shouldn't.

elements.text: That there is no "blessed" IDE in Julia. Too many tools RStudio produces require the RStudio GUI when they shouldn't.

text:
not abusing GUI is one thing. People can abuse CLI even if they don't have GUI (i.e, make a pkg that the interaction can only be done via CLI).

the other side of it is that there's no go-to pkg for GUI development in Julia to begin with.
